page.title: 05Social Activities
page.content: There are 445 practising Catholic families who live in the parish, making the total number of parishioners 1335. Although the parish caters for the spiritual needs of the Catholic families in the area, the adjoining parish centre organizes social events for, and is used by many societies to which all members of the community catholic and non-catholic belong. The Brownies and Guides are well supported by present and ex-pupils of the Holy Family School. The Senior Citizens club meet in the centre each Thursday afternoon. Its 160 members are local elderly people from the area who meet together and arrange their own social events.
